channel.title: tech on Joe Lauletta | Software Engineer

item.title: Ride the bull before it tramples you
item.description: As AI advances, my definition of creativity will have to become more flexible. In a way, this might be the gun to my head that I needed the whole time. I want to think that the average person is so lazy that GPT may never become a household name no matter how streamlined / forced down our throats it gets, but look at how easily we’ve adopted every other technology.
